Variables
SharpNeat.​Evaluation
namespace SharpNeat.Evaluation
IPhenomeEvaluatorPool
public interface
IPhenomeEvaluatorPool​<TPhenome>
PhenomeEvaluatorStackPool

A pool of phenome evaluators.

Used when the phenome evaluators have state, which is expensive to allocate, therefore we wish to maintain a pool or re-usable evaluators instead of constructing and discarding a new evaluator for each evaluation (or more accurately, each Parallel.For partition).

Type Parameter
TPhenome

Phenome type.

Functions
GetEvaluator
IPhenomeEvaluator<TPhenome> GetEvaluator()

Get an evaluator from the pool.

Returns

An evaluator instance.

void ReleaseEvaluator(
IPhenomeEvaluator<TPhenome> evaluator
)

Releases an evaluator back into the pool.

Parameter
evaluator
IPhenomeEvaluator<TPhenome>
